blogPost.excerpt: Instantly and magically create image assets from ordinary screenshots! 🤯 Screenstab eliminates time, cost and effort by auto-generating high-quality graphics for marketing materials, social media posts, illustrations, presentation slides, and more!
blogPost.body: Instantly and magically create image assets from ordinary screenshots! 🤯 Screenstab eliminates time, cost and effort by auto-generating high-quality graphics for marketing materials, social media posts, illustrations, presentation slides, and more!
blogPost.title: Screenstab - Turn plain screenshots into dazzling image assets
blogPost.author: Mikael Åsbjørnsson

localize.description: 瞬间从普通的屏幕截图中神奇地创建图像资产! 🤯 Screenstab通过自动生成高质量的图形，用于营销材料、社交媒体帖子、插图、演示文稿幻灯片等，消除了时间、成本和精力。
localize.tagline: 将普通的屏幕截图变成令人眼花缭乱的图像资产。

localize.description: 瞬間從普通的屏幕截圖中神奇地創建圖像資產! 🤯 Screenstab通過自動生成高質量的圖形，用於營銷材料、社交媒體帖子、插圖、演示文稿幻燈片等，消除了時間、成本和精力。
localize.tagline: 將普通的屏幕截圖變成令人眼花繚亂的圖像資產。

next.excerpt: Afterword is a simple personal library that makes book tracking and sharing reads with friends easier. Afterword features an activity feed, a recommendations page, and the library page to track your own books and see your friend's profiles.
next.title: Afterword - The simplest personal library for readers

localize.description: Afterword是一个简单的个人图书馆，它让书籍追踪和与朋友分享阅读变得更容易。Afterword的功能包括活动源、推荐页面和图书馆页面，可以追踪自己的书籍，查看朋友的资料。
localize.tagline: 读者最简单的个人图书馆

localize.description: Afterword是一個簡單的個人圖書館，它讓書籍追蹤和與朋友分享閱讀變得更容易。Afterword的功能包括活動源、推薦頁面和圖書館頁面，可以追蹤自己的書籍，查看朋友的資料。
localize.tagline: 讀者最簡單的個人圖書館
